name: GoFluent co.
description: GoFluent provide language skills by blending technology, content, and virtual human interaction on any device. goFLUENT provides language solutions in Spanish, French, Chinese, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Korean, Arabic, and Japanese. goFLUENT is present in 20 countries across all continents and has helped millions of people become better communicators in the languages of business.
features: learning with LMS, LXP, or intranet integration
Work through SCORM, SAML 2.0, or API
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: provide everyone an equal voice
ShortDescription: Go Fluent provider of hyper-personalized solutions that accelerate language skills by blending technology, content, and virtual human interaction on any device.
enhanced_description: GoFluent provides hyper-personalized language solutions designed to accelerate skill development by blending technology, diverse content, and virtual human interaction, accessible on any device. The platform supports key business languages including Spanish, French, Chinese, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Korean, Arabic, and Japanese, and operates globally in 20 countries, having empowered millions to enhance their business communication skills.
competitive_advantages: Blended learning approach (technology, content, virtual human interaction)
Proven impact with millions of users
Seamless integration with existing learning ecosystems (LMS, LXP, intranet)
implementation_scenarios: Integration with existing Learning Management Systems (LMS)
roi_benefits: Improved Global Collaboration (implied by language solutions and global presence)
scalability_features: Operates across 20 countries on all continents
